entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Deer Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:13 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Deer Lake Airport 7:18 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: WSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or rain beginning in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow or rain changing to rain late in the evening. Fog patches overnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Local snowfall amount 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 19 February 2023
